revision.text: {{Wireless embedded system |brand=Z-Com |model=XG-1020 |revision=V0.3 |fcc_date=04/20/2007 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=Yes |availability= |type=access point |fcc_id=M4Y-XG1020V04, I88G570SV2 |pcb_id=70-A01020-03N |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Atheros |cpu1_model=AR2318 |cpu1_cspeed=180 |fla1=4 |fla1_brand=Spansion |fla1_model=S25FL032AIF |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5SV8M16DS-6K |expansion_if_types= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module= |wi1_module_if= |wi1_chip1_brand=Atheros |wi1_chip1_model=AR2318 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bg |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL,RP-SMA |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=IC+ |eth_chip2_model=IP101A |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=bg |default_ssid= |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip= |default_user= |default_pass= |oui= |oui_eth= }} "XG-1020V0.3", "70-A01020-03N", and "2006/11/16" :is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
